page.title: 13Leisure Time
page.content: My dad races cars called Hot rods. Nearly every weekend we go racing. On the 6th of July he is in the world final and he will be on television.I won't be there as I am a brides maid for my 2nd cousin. My hobby is riding ponies. At the moment I am lucky to have three of my own ponies. I go in for shows on them once in a while. My mum rides but she does not go in for anything. I also go to karate. I am a white belt at the moment but in a couple of months time I will be a blue belt. My brother goes to karate, he is also a white belt. My brother has Go Carts they have engines in them.He has races in them round the field.
